strings.evolution: Hatred is the true meaning for living...
strings.affinity:
All living things are slaves to their desires.
Those inner desires are their reason for living.
strings.description: A mysterious machine lifeform from a faraway world. He was different from any machine seen before, with long silver hair, and the body of a young man, and his origin shrouded in mystery. He is more intelligent and curious than any normal man could understand, holding an intense interest in humanity. The androids are his natural enemies, and he comes to fight 2B and 9S many times.
strings.fusion:
The longer you hide
the denser the darkness grows...
strings.summon:
You all have an interest in humanity.
I will travel with you until I have
a grasp on that mystery.

strings.affinity:
All living things are slaves to their desires.
Those inner desires are their reason for living.
strings.description: A mysterious machine lifeform from a faraway world. He was born from an amalgamation of machine lifeforms that were living in a desert area. He was different from any machine seen before, with long silver hair, and the body of a young man. Though calm and intellectual, his purpose was of the utmost cruel and vindictive qualities. Little of him is known other than the fact that he travels around with his look-alike younger brother, Eve.
strings.fusion: Humans are fascinating... I'm unable to comprehend them.
strings.summon:
Our creator?
An organism of exceedingly simple design, similar to a plant.

strings.evolution:
Some people seek beauty,
while others seek peace.
For me, it is hatred...
strings.affinity:
All living things are slaves to their desires.
Those inner desires are their reason for living.
strings.description: A mysterious machine lifeform from a faraway world. He was different from any machine seen before, with long silver hair, and the body of a young man, and his origin shrouded in mystery. Not only is he incredibly powerful, his mastery over language compared to other less intelligent machine lifeforms allows him to communicate with ease. He is very interested in the "life" that human's have, and will do whatever it takes to understand it further.
strings.fusion:
Not bad.
This is just the the power I need to destroy those worthless beings.
strings.summon:
Androids are not living things.
They're just puppets that live
according to their own intentions...
